name: SPEAKING EVALUATION
description: Will my speaking score an 8.0? Yes or No answers are of little help. See how our master trainers answer questions such as these.
details:
Our speaking evaluation will give you an insight into the complexities of speaking. From letting you know the mistakes to how frequently they are being made, the evaluation, which is based on the IELTS Speaking Band Descriptors, will give you a score just like the examiners do.

The evaluation presents a score for each assessment parameter giving you a well-defined understanding of what you need to do to improve.

Speak the talk!
